name: Sample Case 9: Zombie Debt Resuscitation (NY)
description: Debt that is past the New York 3-year Statute of Limitations suddenly appearing as a new collection account.
raw_text:
COLLECTIONS

Furnisher: ZOMBIE RECOVERY LLC
Original Creditor: OLD RETAIL BANK
Account Type: Collection
Balance: $1,250
Original Amount: $1,000

DOFD: 05/15/2018
Date Opened: 08/20/2025
State: NY

Estimated Date of Removal: 05/2025

Remarks: RE-ASSIGNED DEBT; ACCOUNT PURCHASED FROM PREVIOUS COLLECTOR
notes: Triggers S1 because New York SOL for consumer debt is 3 years. Triggers ZR1 because the account was opened in 2025, long after the 2018 debt's SOL expired. Triggers J1 due to the dormant account being revived.
